questions.question: What is the return policy?
questions.answer: There must be a deal between the customers and the sellers to determine how returning items should be and our staff is not responsible of it.

questions.question: Can I cancel my order?
questions.answer: Sure! you can cancel your order within first 12 hours.

questions.question: What methods of payment you take?
questions.answer: You can pay online via credit card or pay at the door while dealing with the seller.

questions.question: How do I track my order?
questions.answer: You can have the phone number of the company which does the delivering and ask them where your order is.

questions.question: What is the policy for late/non-delivery of items ordered online?
questions.answer: Our customer service team will be there alwyas to resolve your issue, you can contact us.
